name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior DevOps Engineer with 13+ years of experience in cloud-native application delivery and infrastructure automation. Proficient in **Terraform**, **Puppet**, and **Ansible** for configuration management and orchestration. Extensive expertise in deploying applications on **AWS**, **GCP**, and **Azure**, ensuring compliance with **PCI-DSS** regulations. Skilled in managing Linux environments and scripting with **Bash**. Solid background in programming with **Python** and **Ruby**, as well as experience with **Jenkins** for CI/CD pipelines and version control using **GIT**.

Demonstrated ability to build robust, high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial industries, leveraging technologies such as **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Strong experience in AI/ML-powered platforms that enable predictive analytics and real-time processing. Proficient in database management with **MySQL**, **MariaDB**, **Galera**, and cloud database services like **AWS RDS**, **AWS Aurora**, and **Cloud Spanner**. Well-versed in compliance-driven development, aligning solutions with HIPAA, FHIR, and SOC 2 standards. Significant MLOps experience, including model training and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
